item.text: When Abram was ninety-nine years old, the Lord appeared to him and said, “I am the Sovereign God. Walk before me and be blameless.
Then I will confirm my covenant between me and you, and I will give you a multitude of descendants.”
Abram bowed down with his face to the ground, and God said to him,

“As for <st data-num="0589" class="">me</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="02009" class="">this</st><n id="2" /> is my <st data-num="01285" class="">covenant</st> <st data-num="0854" class="">with</st> you: You will <st data-num="01961" class="">be</st> the <st data-num="01" class="">father</st> of a <st data-num="01995" class="">multitude</st> of <st data-num="01471" class="">nations</st>.

<st data-num="03808" class="">No</st> <st data-num="05750" class="">longer</st> will your <st data-num="08034" class="">name</st> <st data-num="07121" class="">be</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="087" class="">Abram</st>. Instead, your <st data-num="08034" class="">name</st> will <st data-num="01961" class="">be</st> <st data-num="085" class="">Abraham</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="03588" class="">because</st> I will <st data-num="05414" class="">make</st> you<n id="3" /> the <st data-num="01" class="">father</st> of a <st data-num="01995" class="">multitude</st> of <st data-num="01471" class="">nations</st>.

I will <st data-num="06509" class="">make</st> you<n id="1" /> <st data-num="03966 03966">extremely</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="06509" class="">fruitful</st>. I will <st data-num="05414" class="">make</st> <st data-num="01471" class="">nations</st> of you, and <st data-num="04428" class="">kings</st> will <st data-num="03318" class="">descend</st> <st data-num="04480" class="">from</st> you.<n id="3" />

I will <st data-num="06965" class="">confirm</st><n id="1" /> my <st data-num="01285" class="">covenant</st> as a <st data-num="05769" class="">perpetual</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="01285" class="">covenant</st> <st data-num="0996" class="">between</st> me <st data-num="0996" class="">and</st> you. It will <st data-num="0996" class="">extend</st> to your <st data-num="02233" class="">descendants</st> <st data-num="0310" class="">after</st> you throughout their <st data-num="01755" class="">generations</st>. I will <st data-num="01961" class="">be</st> your <st data-num="0430" class="">God</st> and the God of your <st data-num="02233" class="">descendants</st> <st data-num="0310" class="">after</st> you.<n id="3" />
I will give the whole land of Canaan—the land where you are now residing—to you and your descendants after you as a permanent possession. I will be their God.”
Then God said to Abraham, “As for you, you must keep the covenantal requirement I am imposing on you and your descendants after you throughout their generations.

<st data-num="02063" class="">This</st> is my <st data-num="01285" class="">requirement</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> you and your <st data-num="02233" class="">descendants</st> <st data-num="0310" class="">after</st> you must <st data-num="08104 0996 0996 0996">keep</st>:<n id="1" /> <st data-num="03605" class="">Every</st> <st data-num="02145" class="">male</st> among you must be <st data-num="04135" class="">circumcised</st>.<n id="2" />

You must <st data-num="05243" class="">circumcise</st> the <st data-num="01320" class="">flesh</st> of your <st data-num="06190" class="">foreskins</st>. This will <st data-num="01961" class="">be</st> a <st data-num="0226" class="">reminder</st><n id="1" /> of the <st data-num="01285" class="">covenant</st> <st data-num="0996" class="">between</st> me <st data-num="0996" class="">and</st> you.

Throughout your <st data-num="01755" class="">generations</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">every</st> <st data-num="02145" class="">male</st> among you who is <st data-num="08083" class="">eight</st> <st data-num="03117" class="">days</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">old</st><n id="1" /> must be <st data-num="04135" class="">circumcised</st>, whether <st data-num="03211" class="">born</st> in your <st data-num="01004" class="">house</st> or <st data-num="04736" class="">bought</st> with <st data-num="03701" class="">money</st> from <st data-num="03605" class="">any</st> <st data-num="01121 05236">foreigner</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">who</st> <st data-num="01931" class="">is</st> <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> one of your <st data-num="02233" class="">descendants</st>.

They must <st data-num="04135" class="">indeed</st> be <st data-num="04135" class="">circumcised</st>,<n id="1" /> whether <st data-num="03211" class="">born</st> in your <st data-num="01004" class="">house</st> or <st data-num="04736" class="">bought</st> with <st data-num="03701" class="">money</st>. The <st data-num="01285" class="">sign of</st> my <st data-num="01285" class="">covenant</st><n id="2" /> will <st data-num="01961" class="">be</st> visible in your <st data-num="01320" class="">flesh</st> as a <st data-num="05769" class="">permanent</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="01285" class="">reminder</st>.
Any uncircumcised male who has not been circumcised in the flesh of his foreskin will be cut off from his people—he has failed to carry out my requirement.”
Then God said to Abraham, “As for your wife, you must no longer call her Sarai; Sarah will be her name.
I will bless her and will give you a son through her. I will bless her and she will become a mother of nations. Kings of countries will come from her!”
Then Abraham bowed down with his face to the ground and laughed as he said to himself, “Can a son be born to a man who is a hundred years old? Can Sarah bear a child at the age of ninety?”
Abraham said to God, “O that Ishmael might live before you!”
God said, “No, Sarah your wife is going to bear you a son, and you will name him Isaac. I will confirm my covenant with him as a perpetual covenant for his descendants after him.

As for <st data-num="03458" class="">Ishmael</st>, I have <st data-num="08085" class="">heard</st> you.<n id="1" /> I will <st data-num="02009" class="">indeed</st> <st data-num="01288" class="">bless</st> him, <st data-num="06509" class="">make</st> him <st data-num="06509" class="">fruitful</st>, and <st data-num="07235" class="">give</st> him <st data-num="03966 03966">a multitude of</st> <st data-num="07235" class="">descendants</st>.<n id="2" /> He will <st data-num="03205" class="">become the father of</st> <st data-num="08147 06240">twelve</st> <st data-num="05387" class="">princes</st>;<n id="3" /> I will <st data-num="05414" class="">make</st> him into a <st data-num="01419" class="">great</st> <st data-num="01471" class="">nation</st>.

But I will <st data-num="06965" class="">establish</st> my <st data-num="01285" class="">covenant</st> <st data-num="0854" class="">with</st> <st data-num="03327" class="">Isaac</st>, <st data-num="0834" class="">whom</st> <st data-num="08283" class="">Sarah</st> will <st data-num="03205" class="">bear</st> to you at <st data-num="02088" class="">this</st> <st data-num="04150" class="">set time</st> <st data-num="0312" class="">next</st> <st data-num="08141" class="">year</st>.”
When he finished speaking with Abraham, God went up from him.
Abraham took his son Ishmael and every male in his household (whether born in his house or bought with money) and circumcised them on that very same day, just as God had told him to do.

Now <st data-num="085" class="">Abraham</st> was <st data-num="08673 08672">ninety-nine</st> <st data-num="08141" class="">years</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">old</st><n id="1" /> when he was <st data-num="04135 01320 06190">circumcised</st>;<n id="2" />

his <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> <st data-num="03458" class="">Ishmael</st> was <st data-num="07969 06240">thirteen</st> <st data-num="08141" class="">years</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">old</st><n id="1" /> when he was <st data-num="04135 01320 06190">circumcised</st>.

<st data-num="085" class="">Abraham</st> and his <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> <st data-num="03458" class="">Ishmael</st> were <st data-num="04135" class="">circumcised</st> on <st data-num="02088" class="">the</st> <st data-num="06106" class="">very same</st> <st data-num="03117" class="">day</st>.
All the men of his household, whether born in his household or bought with money from a foreigner, were circumcised with him.
